name: BREAK (itch) (JoanGG)
description:
This game was made for the gamejam Mini Jam 87: Break. Play as two little knights chained together by some misterious cause we cant explain (didnt had time to) who will have to sort their way through the kingdom in orden to get to the final room in order to break free.

Controls: Move each character individually

Player 1: 

Move: WASD

Jump: C

Dash: V

Player 2:

Move: Arrows

Jump: " . "

Dash: " - "

alt+f4 to quit the game

Team:

Daniel - Art and Coding

Diego - Coding

Luis - Music

Mirek - Art

Joan - Coding
